name: Broom Broom Game (University Research project)
description:
Welcome to Broom Broom game, and thank you for playing!

This is just a simple driving game that was made to find out the best way of creating a sense of speed.

There is no goal to the game, so just drive the car around for a bit, try out the different effects and exit whenever you feel like it.

(Also try combinations of effects)

Once you have finished, please fill out this survey

https://forms.gle/iXNC8CPgD8iHsRrC9
